---
title: LD_FLOW
---

LD_FLOW computes linkage disequilibrium (LD) metrics for loci using a user-supplied reference panel (PLINK).

Key responsibilities

- Compute r2 values for nearby proxies using PLINK.
- Annotate loci with LD proxies above threshold (`ld_window_r2`, `ld_window_kb`).

Important parameters

- `ld_reference_panel` - path to the PLINK-formatted reference panel.
- `ld_window_kb`, `ld_window_r2`, `ld_window` - tune LD windowing behavior.

Outputs

- LD annotation files per locus and aggregated LD tables.
